docblock.description: Channels is part of the Beam API Library for PHP
docblock.long-description: Channels provides an interface for the /channels/ endpoint of the Beam API

tag.name: author
tag.description: Chris Ireland

tag.name: license
tag.description: MIT <http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT>

docblock.description: Returns a list of all the channels on beam <https://developer.beam.pro/api/channel/find>

tag.name: param
tag.description: Specifies the attribute that for the order in which channels should be displayed

tag.name: param
tag.description: Order should be one of asc or desc

tag.name: param
tag.description: Filters the results to a specific subset. Valid values are: featured, partnered

tag.name: param
tag.description: Page of results to get

tag.name: param
tag.description: Number of results per page to retrieve

docblock.description: Return a list of all possible types of channels <https://developer.beam.pro/api/channel/types>
Return all the channels in a particular slug/type <https://developer.beam.pro/api/channel/inType>

tag.name: param
tag.description: Specifies the attribute that for the order in which channels should be displayed

tag.name: param
tag.description: Order should be one of asc or desc

tag.name: param
tag.description: Filters the results to a specific subset. Valid values are: featured, partnered

tag.name: param
tag.description: Page of results to get

tag.name: param
tag.description: Number of results per page to retrieve

docblock.description: Search channels using a scope and query <https://developer.beam.pro/api/channel/search>

tag.name: param
tag.description: Scope specifies the channel attributes you want to search for using the $query

tag.name: param
tag.description: The string to search by, in the previously provided $scope

tag.name: param
tag.description: Page of results to get

tag.name: param
tag.description: Number of results per page to retrieve

docblock.description: Returns a list of all the categories in the shop <https://developer.beam.pro/api/shop/categories>

tag.name: param
tag.description: Category id to search in

tag.name: param
tag.description: Specifies the attribute that for the order in which items should be displayed

tag.name: param
tag.description: Order should be one of asc or desc

docblock.description: Returns information about a shop item <https://developer.beam.pro/api/shop/findOne>

tag.name: param
tag.description: The item id to display
